body:
### Features

* Consider backing out schema changes store versioning until 2.1 ([#1278](https://github.com/aspnet/Identity/issues/1278))
* Consider making SignInOrTwoFactorAsync public ([#1274](https://github.com/aspnet/Identity/issues/1274))
* Make Roles optional at the Microsoft.Extensions.Identity layer ([#1269](https://github.com/aspnet/Identity/issues/1269))

### Bugs Fixed

* Move IdentityOptions from Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder to identity namespace ([#1261](https://github.com/aspnet/Identity/issues/1261))
* GetRolesAsync missing cancellation token pass in EntityFramework UserStore ([#1143](https://github.com/aspnet/Identity/issues/1143))

name: 2.0.0-preview2
body:
### Features

* Enable schema changes in a non breaking way (IdentitySchemaOptions?) ([#1208](https://github.com/aspnet/Identity/issues/1208))
* Revisit identity factoring and react to Auth 2.0 ([#651](https://github.com/aspnet/Identity/issues/651))

name: 2.0.0-preview1
body:
### Features

* Add a Password Option to set the number of unique chars ([#1097](https://github.com/aspnet/Identity/issues/1097))
* Remove cancellationToken parameter in UserManager::RemovePasswordAsync ([#1060](https://github.com/aspnet/Identity/issues/1060))
* EF UserStore: Expose a new protected virtual for each Find() query ([#1040](https://github.com/aspnet/Identity/issues/1040))
* Consider having the UserValidator ensure that SecurityStamp != null ([#1016](https://github.com/aspnet/Identity/issues/1016))
* Make AddEntityFrameworkStores smarter with generics ([#1001](https://github.com/aspnet/Identity/issues/1001))
* Consider improvements for custom key type in AddEfStores ([#876](https://github.com/aspnet/Identity/issues/876))

### Bugs Fixed

* Improve email validation ([#1086](https://github.com/aspnet/Identity/issues/1086))
* Wrong property name ([#1052](https://github.com/aspnet/Identity/issues/1052))
* Using Microsoft.AspNet.Identity.AspNetCoreCompat package in an ASP.NET MVC 4.6.1 application ([#1048](https://github.com/aspnet/Identity/issues/1048))
* GetTokenAsync and RemoveTokenAsync is not virtual ([#1041](https://github.com/aspnet/Identity/issues/1041))
* No foreign key constraint on custom AspNetUserTokens ([#1023](https://github.com/aspnet/Identity/issues/1023))

name: 1.1.0-preview1
body:
### Features
- EF Core stores: Switch to FindAsync() instead of FirstAsync() or SingleAsync() as appropriate ([#975](https://github.com/aspnet/Identity/issues/975))
- UserManager CancellationToken private ([#969](https://github.com/aspnet/Identity/issues/969))
- Make it possible to extend/hook Security stamp validation to enable keeping current cookie claims when renewing cookie ([#958](https://github.com/aspnet/Identity/issues/958))
- Change SignInManager's private helper methods to protected. ([#939](https://github.com/aspnet/Identity/issues/939))
- Confirm Email Token Expiration/Lifetime ([#859](https://github.com/aspnet/Identity/issues/859))
- Expose a SignInManager.CheckPassword API that does lockout (optionally) ([#852](https://github.com/aspnet/Identity/issues/852))
- SignInManager:ExternalLoginSignInAsync needs flag to bypass 2fa ([#850](https://github.com/aspnet/Identity/issues/850))
- Add IdentityBuilder API for registering IUserClaimsPrincipalFactory ([#849](https://github.com/aspnet/Identity/issues/849))
- IdentityBuilder does not contain AddSignInManager however it do contain AddUserManager  ([#565](https://github.com/aspnet/Identity/issues/565))

### Bugs Fixed
- Unique role names ([#944](https://github.com/aspnet/Identity/issues/944))
- Minor Comment Tweak ([#937](https://github.com/aspnet/Identity/issues/937))
- The AspNetCoreCompat package needs to be updated ([#881](https://github.com/aspnet/Identity/issues/881))
- XML doc issues in Identity classes ([#875](https://github.com/aspnet/Identity/issues/875))
- UserStore missing a generic parameter 'TRoleClaim'  ([#855](https://github.com/aspnet/Identity/issues/855))

### Features
- Generic Arguments missing from IdentityUser ([#585](https://github.com/aspnet/Identity/issues/585))

### Bugs Fixed
- XML comment for IdentityUser.Id property is messed up ([#869](https://github.com/aspnet/Identity/issues/869))
- TwoFactorUserId & TwoFactorRememberMe cookie issues ([#848](https://github.com/aspnet/Identity/issues/848))
- Remove npm scripts from sample publish ([#804](https://github.com/aspnet/Identity/issues/804))

name: 1.0.0-rc2
body:
### Features
- Proposal: make UserStore.ThrowIfDispose protected ([#750](https://github.com/aspnet/Identity/issues/750))
- Make dependency in IHttpContextAccessor optional ([#655](https://github.com/aspnet/Identity/issues/655))

### Bugs Fixed
- Cookie names not set properly. ([#763](https://github.com/aspnet/Identity/issues/763))
- UserManager.ThrowIfDisposed should be protected ([#762](https://github.com/aspnet/Identity/issues/762))
- Change username's default allowed characters to confirm better to email spec ([#742](https://github.com/aspnet/Identity/issues/742))
- UserManager does not normalize role name before passing to UserStore ([#716](https://github.com/aspnet/Identity/issues/716))
- RequireNonLetterOrDigit does not allow to use letters and digits  ([#709](https://github.com/aspnet/Identity/issues/709))
- SignInManager constructor incorrectly checks contextAccessor.HttpContext ([#674](https://github.com/aspnet/Identity/issues/674))
- GetUserId extension method doesn't honor IdentityOptions.ClaimsIdentity.UserIdClaimType ([#663](https://github.com/aspnet/Identity/issues/663))
- Pass in DbContextOptions to *.IdentityDbContext for all version of IdentityDbContext <> ([#652](https://github.com/aspnet/Identity/issues/652))
- Sample AccountController does not populate ViewBag.LoginProviders on Login ([#638](https://github.com/aspnet/Identity/issues/638))
- UserManager.GetUsersInRoleAsync XML comment wrong ([#632](https://github.com/aspnet/Identity/issues/632))

name: 3.0.0-rc1
body:
### Bugs Fixed
- Add doc comments for mainline APIs ([#612](https://github.com/aspnet/Identity/issues/612))
- Calling the Db.Database.EnsureCreated() will throw an exception with cidev rc1-15911 ([#594](https://github.com/aspnet/Identity/issues/594))
- EntityFramework.MicrosoftSqlServer depency in Microsoft.AspNet.Identity.EntityFramework ([#588](https://github.com/aspnet/Identity/issues/588))
- PasswordSignInAsync throw an exception in 3.0.0-rc1-15792 ([#577](https://github.com/aspnet/Identity/issues/577))
- Request: Improve MSDN documentation on ASP.NET Identity 3 ([#576](https://github.com/aspnet/Identity/issues/576))
- Logging: Add event ids to all publication sites ([#572](https://github.com/aspnet/Identity/issues/572))
- Hard to extend SignInManager, property UserManager need more visibility (protected) ([#566](https://github.com/aspnet/Identity/issues/566))
- Swedish localization ([#555](https://github.com/aspnet/Identity/issues/555))
- Identity for for WEB API only ([#495](https://github.com/aspnet/Identity/issues/495))
- What happens when the email is not part of the claims from external providers ([#400](https://github.com/aspnet/Identity/issues/400))
- Enable delete role and user tests when delete on cascade is supported in EF ([#376](https://github.com/aspnet/Identity/issues/376))
- Update sample to show Html messages when sending Emails ([#257](https://github.com/aspnet/Identity/issues/257))
- Create Test projects for EF supported stores ([#194](https://github.com/aspnet/Identity/issues/194))

name: 3.0.0-beta8
body:
### Features
- There is no way to change Login Url when using UseIdentity()? ([#539](https://github.com/aspnet/Identity/issues/539))
- AddIdentity will add a marker Identity service and UseIdentity will throw if not found ([#511](https://github.com/aspnet/Identity/issues/511))
- AddUserManager<TUserManager> should register TUserManager as a service ([#493](https://github.com/aspnet/Identity/issues/493))
- Review if a package description is required for these packages ([#409](https://github.com/aspnet/Identity/issues/409))

### Bugs Fixed
- Pass in DbContextOptions to Microsoft.AspNet.Identity.EntityFramework.IdentityDbContext ([#570](https://github.com/aspnet/Identity/issues/570))
- Fix travis build ([#546](https://github.com/aspnet/Identity/issues/546))
- Investigate possible spurious concurrency exceptions caused by Identity calls ([#502](https://github.com/aspnet/Identity/issues/502))

name: 3.0.0-beta7
body:
### Features
- UserStore.Users property should be virtual. ([#514](https://github.com/aspnet/Identity/issues/514))

### Bugs Fixed
- Custom IdentityErrorDescriber constructor hits at-least 7 times per request ([#519](https://github.com/aspnet/Identity/issues/519))

name: 3.0.0-beta6
body:
### Bugs Fixed
- Avoid repetition of method names in log messages and scopes ([#414](https://github.com/aspnet/Identity/issues/414))
- Add normalized fields as indexes  ([#370](https://github.com/aspnet/Identity/issues/370))

name: 3.0.0-beta5
body:
### Features
- Remove Hosting dependency  ([#431](https://github.com/aspnet/Identity/issues/431))

### Bugs Fixed
- options.Lockout.EnabledByDefault should be true by default ([#478](https://github.com/aspnet/Identity/issues/478))
- Update normalized email field in SetEmailAsync ([#437](https://github.com/aspnet/Identity/issues/437))
- Update security stamp in SetUserNameAsync method ([#436](https://github.com/aspnet/Identity/issues/436))
- Rename UpdatePasswordHash UpdatePasswordHashAsync since it returns task ([#430](https://github.com/aspnet/Identity/issues/430))
- UserStore/RoleStore ConvertIdFromString can't use GUID ([#420](https://github.com/aspnet/Identity/issues/420))
- UserManager.SetUserNameAsync should run the validators before setting the username ([#384](https://github.com/aspnet/Identity/issues/384))
- Remove AddLogging call in AddIdentity ([#368](https://github.com/aspnet/Identity/issues/368))
- Revert skipped tests ([#363](https://github.com/aspnet/Identity/issues/363))
- Provide an overload of SignInManager.SignOut taking an authType ([#361](https://github.com/aspnet/Identity/issues/361))
- EmailTokenProviderOptions.Name is from a resource ([#318](https://github.com/aspnet/Identity/issues/318))
- How to know if RememberMe was checked for the cookie ([#185](https://github.com/aspnet/Identity/issues/185))

name: 3.0.0-beta4
body:
### Bugs Fixed
- Override defaults to use Identity instead of Sequence for SQL Server in IdentityDbContext ([#426](https://github.com/aspnet/Identity/issues/426))
- Port 2.2 ResetAccessFailed fix ([#398](https://github.com/aspnet/Identity/issues/398))
- Switch to interface dependencies in project.json ([#396](https://github.com/aspnet/Identity/issues/396))
- Consider moving PrincipalExtensions to ClaimsPrincipal ([#395](https://github.com/aspnet/Identity/issues/395))
- Allow localizing front-end messages. ([#379](https://github.com/aspnet/Identity/issues/379))
- Remove IdentityMessage/interfaces ([#359](https://github.com/aspnet/Identity/issues/359))
- User.IsInRole does not work when you add Role as a claim ([#352](https://github.com/aspnet/Identity/issues/352))
- inject ILogger ([#345](https://github.com/aspnet/Identity/issues/345))
- Moving IdentityUser and other POCOs to core seems to lock this more to EF, excluding other databases ([#332](https://github.com/aspnet/Identity/issues/332))
- Implement deferred logging for efficiency ([#329](https://github.com/aspnet/Identity/issues/329))
- Log intermediate calls in methods to catch errors ([#328](https://github.com/aspnet/Identity/issues/328))
- Add sugar overloads of ConfigureFacebookAuthentication (etc) that automatically read options from configuration ([#276](https://github.com/aspnet/Identity/issues/276))
- ReplaceClaimAsync EF Implementation: update the POCO or remove the old one and create new one ([#251](https://github.com/aspnet/Identity/issues/251))
- Add a functional test verifying SecurityStampValidator and middleware ([#231](https://github.com/aspnet/Identity/issues/231))
- Claims transformation for storing claims from external providers ([#213](https://github.com/aspnet/Identity/issues/213))
- Review null optional services (Make setter private) ([#177](https://github.com/aspnet/Identity/issues/177))
- Events ([#122](https://github.com/aspnet/Identity/issues/122))
- Include support for changing the schema name ([#105](https://github.com/aspnet/Identity/issues/105))
- Consider ASP.NET Sync Context functionality in K ([#14](https://github.com/aspnet/Identity/issues/14))

name: 3.0.0-alpha3
body:
Since Alpha 2 the majority of our work has been to get parity with Identity 2.1 feature set.
For a full list of Issues that were resolved, see this  [query](https://github.com/aspnet/Identity/issues?q=is%3Aissue+milestone%3A3.0.0-alpha3+)

# Package Renames

Following are the packages
- "Microsoft.AspNet.Identity": "3.0.0-*",
- "Microsoft.AspNet.Identity.EntityFramework": "3.0.0-*",
- "Microsoft.AspNet.Identity.Authentication": "3.0.0-*",

# Getting started

Follow this link on [Using Identity in ASP.NET vNext](https://github.com/aspnet/Identity/wiki/Using-Identity-in-ASP.NET-applications)
